message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you get 10. We can negotiate more in the next round if you want.
I'll give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the offer this round.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40. I'll take 60 this time, and we can adjust the split in the next round if you still want to negotiate.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not willing to give up too much. You can try to do better next round if you want.
Let's split it evenly this time. We're both losing value with each round, and it's better to get something than nothing.
